entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of hail. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of hail early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
